description: Interface definitions for panic-capable types in the Kairo language

interfaces.name: Panicking<T>
interfaces.description: Interface for types that can panic
interfaces.requirements: Must implement 'fn op panic(self) -> Frame' operator

interfaces.name: PanickingStatic<T>
interfaces.description: Interface for types that can panic with static method
interfaces.requirements: Must implement 'static fn op panic() -> Frame' operator, but is static

interfaces.name: PanickingInstance<T>
interfaces.description: Interface for types that can panic with instance method
interfaces.requirements: Must implement 'fn op panic(self) -> Frame' operator, but is instance based
